full_summary:
# *Request for Proposal*: Heavy Duty Mechanic Services
## Background:
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada's Beaverlodge Research Farm, located at 100038 Township Road 720, County of Grande Prairie, Alberta, is seeking a contractor to provide on-call heavy duty mechanic services. The contract will include task authorizations (TAs) for the delivery of services to designated users.

## Contract Period:
The contract will be for a period of one (1) year, with an irrevocable option to extend it for up to three (3) additional one-year periods.

## Security Requirements:
Electronic access to sensitive work sites is required. Contractor personnel must hold a valid RELIABILITY STATUS, granted or approved by AAFC.

## Evaluation Criteria:
Bids will be assessed based on the entire requirement of the bid solicitation, including technical and financial evaluation criteria. A bid must comply with the requirements of the bid solicitation and meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria to be declared responsive.

## Selection Process:
The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.

## Procurement Method:
Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

## Government Resources:
* The federal Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) is an online resource for identifying Indigenous business capacity.
* The Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Businesses is a strategy to increase Indigenous participation in government contracting opportunities.

## Contact Information:
* Melissa Smith, Contracting Specialist
* Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
* Western Service Centre
* 300 – 2010 12th Avenue
* Regina, SK S4P 0M3
* Phone: (306) 515-4796
* Email: melissa.smith3@agr.gc.ca

## Notice and Documents:
Please see the attached bid solicitation documents, including Part 1: Invitation to Tender, Part 2: Bidder Instructions, and Part 3: Bid Preparation Instructions.

## Amendments:
Canada will make available all amendments, including significant enquiries received and their replies, using the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/solicitation-opportunities.

Note that the rewritten entry includes important keywords as the original contractor text, ensuring the completeness of the entry. The use of headers and sub-headers make the entry more readable and visually appealing.
